nodes.documentation:
his is a smart contract for storing pictures, their prices,
heir buyers and sellers,as well as their descriptions.
he codes are based from the following
itle: How To Build A Blockchain App with Ethereum, Web3.js & Solidity Smart Contracts
uthor: Gregory McCubbin
ate: 2019
vailability: https://www.dappuniversity.com/articles/how-to-build-a-blockchain-app
